short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to automatize the login process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You don't want to type your username and password repeatedly? Try this extension to automatically log in to the system without doing it so.

This extension will help you automatically log in to the server as soon as you open chrome. The extension is specially made for the Atmiya University students and faculties to login into the internet connection page automatically.

This extension only stores your credentials and configurations in chrome's safe local storage so it can function properly.

The extension is open source and doesn't collect any kind of user data.

This extension is free to use for everyone and not sponsored by anyone.
